title: PMS 2.0 542 - Thursday Night Football Recap, NFL Week 11 Preview, Kyle Van Noy, Coach Jason Brown, & AJ Hawk
description: On today's show, Pat, AJ Hawk, and the boys chat about last night's Super Boost win as the Patriots beat the hell out of the Falcons in Atlanta, why Mac Jones fell so far in the draft and how it appears he is definitely a dude, how good the Patriots defense is, and look at some other news before they make all their picks for every game this weekend in week 11 of the NFL season. Joining Pat and AJ Hawk after 2 sacks and a pick six last night, friend of the program, 2x Super Bowl Champion, Kyle Van Noy. Pat, Kyle, and AJ chat about this year's Patriots team, what it's like being teammates with Mac Jones and how he carries himself, what he thought coming back to New England after getting let go in Miami and how he continues to feel like he needs to prove himself, why he's excited about where the Patriots are at but acknowledges how far they have to go (36:42-51:37).  Next, Coach JB joins Pat and and AJ Hawk to chat about the college football landscape and all the different coaching openings, plus he gives out his picks for this weekend (1:11:18-1:31:54). Make sure you subscribe to youtube.com/thepatmcafeeshow and listen every day on Mad Dog Radio, Sirius XM Channel 82. We appreciate you all for listening, come and laugh with us, cheers.
dc:creator: Pat McAfee
